New Records: New Zealand's highest World Cup total of 401 runs.
Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman scored an unbeaten 126 off 81 balls.
Pakistan won by 21 runs using the DLS method.
Williamson's diving catch dismissed Abdullah Shafique.
Fakhar Zaman hit nine sixes in his innings.
Pakistan were fined 10% of their match fees for a slow over rate.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's decision to field first raised eyebrows on a flat wicket.
Post-Match Reflections: Mumtaz on Fakhar's knock: 'Pakistan's dreams and hopes alive due to one man'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, leading to a DLS method decision.
Pakistan's win levels them on points with New Zealand, putting a semi-final berth within realistic grasp.
